English: I will meet you at the park at 3 PM.
Spanish: Te encontraré en el parque a las 3 PM.
El tren parte a las 10 AM.

English: Don't forget to set your alarm.
Spanish: No te olvides de pondrle la alarma.

English: We will start the meeting at 2 PM.
Spanish: Empezaremos la reunión a las 2 PM.

English: The time for this event has passed.
Spanish: El tiempo para este evento ha pasado.
